name: Arch Package Search v2
description: Search for packages in Arch Linux with your choice of AUR Helper

preferences.name: AUR Helper
preferences.description: Determines which AUR helper will be used to query packages and what command will be copied to the clipboard. It must use pacman style -S and -Ss flags

preferences.name: Always Use AUR Helper
preferences.description: Always copy AUR Helper commands even when packages are from the normal repositores. (Recommended No.)
